topic_coverage.summary: Focus on adapting to high school, cultural heritage, and varied writing types.

categories.name: Category 1: Teen Life (Man & Self)
sub_topics: High School Life (Challenges, New Friends, Clubs)
Healthy Lifestyle (Mental Health, Dealing with Stress)
Learning Strategies (How to learn English efficiently)
example_prompts: My First Week at Senior High
A Letter of Advice on Learning English

categories.name: Category 2: Culture & travel (Man & Society)
sub_topics: Cultural Heritage (Amber Room, Great Wall, protecting relics)
Festivals & Celebrations (Christmas, Spring Festival, Day of the Dead)

categories.name: Category 3: Nature & Science (Man & Nature)
sub_topics: Wildlife Protection (Endangered species like Tibetan Antelopes)
Space Exploration (Astronauts, Future life in space)

vocabulary.level_requirement: Proficiency in 2000-2500 words. Focus on topic-specific nouns and academic verbs.

complex_structures: Infinitive and V-ing forms as Subject/Object
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Use of introductory phrases, transition signals, and mixed sentence types.

writing_standards.cohesion: Use advanced linkers: Furthermore, Consequently, In contrast, To sum up.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Rich vocabulary, varied sentence structures, clear logic, genre appropriateness.
